okhttp3

Class JavaNetAuthenticator

  • java.lang.Object
    • okhttp3.JavaNetAuthenticator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authenticator

    @EverythingIsNonNull
public final class JavaNetAuthenticator
extends Object
implements Authenticator
    Adapts Authenticator to Authenticator. Configure OkHttp to use Authenticator with OkHttpClient.Builder.authenticator or OkHttpClient.Builder.proxyAuthenticator(Authenticator).
